entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Mayo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:07 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Mayo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:42 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -47.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mayo Airport 11:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -47.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -52
Dewpoint: -51.9°C
Wind: N 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 47 with temperature rising to minus 38 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning near midnight. Ice fog dissipating near midnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 47 with temperature rising to minus 38 by morning. Wind chill minus 59 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 31.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 54 in the morning and minus 40 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 31.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 31. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
